title: Which colleges are the most ideal for a BA in English under Mumbai University? - Quora

response.answer_text: In Mumbai University affiliated colleges St Xavier's College, K C College, Jai Hind College, in South Mumbai, Ruia College, in Matunga, Andrews College, in Bandra, Mithibai College, in Juhu National College in Bandra should be some of the colleges that would be good for English Major B A. SNDT Women's University, offers BA in English at its Churchgate university conducted college, and in affiliated colleges of SNDT at Malad (west) Shri M D Shah Mahila College & in Vile Parle Maniben Nanavati College. However admissions are open only to girls. Similarly Sophia's College in Central Mumbai has BA English only for girls.
